review_text: Great house, great value, very quiet, very comfortable.

Absolutely wonderful place to stay at. Perfect for our family!
Everything looked picture perfect and the beds were super comfy.
Charity was super kind and proactive, always sending the info we needed before we even had to ask.
5/5, would stay again!
Great place to stay. Very out of the way and quiet. Plenty of space for several people.
I felt welcomed and very well cared for during my stay. Beautiful property and attentive host!
Will definitely stay there again.
Second time staying was just as great as the first. Couldn’t recommend this place more. Fantastic place with even better hosts.

Charity's place was awesome! Really nice and comfortable and easy to get in to. Really nice to have the garage too and she was so easy to work with and communicate with. The value was amazing too. I would highly recommend staying here.

This was the perfect landing spot for hiking in the area. We loved the rental which was on a farm with sheep, chickens, a small horse/pony or mule. We had lots of privacy and the host was truly amazing with immediate correspondence when I sent an inquiry. The farm fresh chicken eggs provided were delicious and such a nice surprise. Thank you so much and if I’m in the area again this will be the first place I reach out to.

Can’t say enough about our gracious hosts they checked on us all the time making sure our stay was great. Location was super peaceful which was great after a long day of work. Everything was clean and exactly as described. Can’t thank them enough for a wonderful stay.

This location is very close to downtown and only 6 minutes from the Baseball fields. Charity was very helpful when I didn’t have access to my email. Promo responses. Very clean and beautiful Airbnb. Would highly recommend.

Charity and Ben’s place is perfect if you’re looking for privacy along with peace and quiet. It was great being able to see the sheep and donkey each morning when we started our day. Another really neat feature of this property is the use of the garage to park your vehicle. I have never had this at any other AIR BNB I have stayed and I can say it was quite convenient. Overall, the property is a great value and exactly as described. Would definitely stay again.
Wonderful, beyond expectations! Relaxing, comfortable setting that felt like home away from home. Hostess was very responsive and helpful! Highly recommend! Would stay here again!

This place exceeded my expectations. It has everything you could possibly need, and is on a gorgeous and quiet property. The inside is all nice and new, very clean. Charity gave us a tour of the farm and introduced us to all her animals, and we left with almost 3 dozen eggs! We had such an amazing time on this charming farm.
Beautiful home in a peaceful setting. Was a perfect place for a Mother Daughter getaway.
Beautiful and clean at a great price!
Charity was a great host. The stay was above and beyond my expectations.
For less than the cost of a motel this was a vastly superior accommodation.
Private, clean, nice views, quick drive to town. Charity was a great host!
Beautiful peaceful place both Ben and Charity were vary helpful and accommodating with the terrible weather thank u for the hospitality and the fresh eggs 🥚.

I just enjoyed a wonderful stay at Happy ZZ. Beautiful, peaceful location just outside West Plains. I loved watching the chickens, sheep and donkey. The extra touch of fresh eggs made my day. The kitchen was well appointed without extra clutter. Tastefully decorated and comfy. The hosts were friendly and kind. Felt very at home. We have found a perfect place to stay!
Convenient location.
house had everything we needed would stay again.
We have stayed here several times. The house is always clean and comfortable. Makes our trip so much more restful than staying in a hotel. Love it!!
The guys loved their stay!!

We enjoyed our time in Naomi's lovely airbnb so much! It's in a very safe neighborhood with a garage stall to park your car in! A first for us after 28 airbnb rentals! The home has a soothing color scheme, with beautiful decor and is free of clutter. The kitchen was a great place to cook and gather with family, as well as the front porch and back deck. We even took several walks throughout the neighborhood and felt safe and at ease. The bed and pillows were super comfy with a ceiling fan in the master bedroom for a nice little breeze while we slept. Naomi is a friendly and responsive host and I would definitively stay in her lovely home again. Thank you Naomi for creating a wonderful home away from home!
This was great for our group. 3 adults and 2 small kids. We had everything we needed, and Naomi was very responsive. We’ll definitely be back.
We had some trouble with the door code but Naomi was quick to remedy the problem. Other than that a fantastic place.
Beautiful home! Naomi made us feel very welcome and at home!
Thanks so much for letting us stay at your place! It was a nice slice of relaxation super close to the Civic Center while we were in town on business!

My family had a great time at the house. Lots of room vary family oriented. We got to see majority of family, my wife is from the area. So it was easy to see family. Naomi was a great host and easy to communicate if we had a question she was fast to respond. My family and I would love to stay again, we go back to visit family.
The guys enjoyed their stay!
Best place of 4 we have rented in West Plains.

This is the second time we have stayed at Naomi’s and I highly recommend it! We love the neighborhood and the overall quality of the home. It has everything you could need. Naomi is always quick to respond to any concerns or questions. And we will absolutely stay again!
We enjoyed our stay. I wish we had more time to enjoy the quiet and beautiful fall weather.
Our stay was brief but very pleasant. The place was spotless, beds comfy, and the neighborhood was quiet, which was just what we needed.
Great place! Highly recommend!
Great stay!
very clean modern home with great amenities.
Awesome place thank you!
We loved our stay at the cottage. We loved the easy access to the rivers nearby to float on for the day trip! Super great weekend getaway!! We will definitely be back!!
Great place to stay. Modern decor, nicely equipped kitchen though we didn’t cook. We were there for a couple of nights visiting relatives. Quiet and safe neighborhood.
Beautiful place
Naomi was great to work with! This home is just as pictured and described. Will definitely be booking this one again!!
Naomi was very accommodating to my out of town guests. Thank you for the hospitality
This is a beautifully done house in a convenient location. It was very quiet and comfortable. Naomi was very responsive when I had a question. We would definitely stay here again.
Very nice and clean! Cute decor. Quiet neighborhood. Just two of us but can hold many more.

Staying at Naomi’s home was an excellent choice for my family. We had 6 people total: myself and my husband, our two kids, and my in-laws. The size was perfect and comfortable for all of us.
The house was super clean and comfortable. You can tell it was recently renovated and she chose terrific furniture and decor.
We stayed for a few nights to celebrate my grandpa’s 90th birthday. It was nice to be able to cook in the kitchen and have access to a full size refrigerator.
I would definitely recommend this house to anyone in need of a comfortable and clean place to stay in West Plains. Also has a sister posting to rent the basement if you need more room.
House was very clean and updated. It had all we needed for our stay. Naomi was helpful and quick to respond. Would recommend to friends and family.

We loved staying at this Airbnb. It was a great home away from home with all the amenities. The beds were super comfortable, they had a great set up for the kitchen and living room. The master bathroom was off the charts. Don’t forget to bring bubble bath to take a nice long soak in the amazing tub. It’s close to restaurants and has everything you need to cook in the kitchen. We will definitely be back. I would recommend this accommodation to anyone if it’s available.
Very modern and updated. Clean and roomy. Held our large family easy. Host was very kind!
There are not enough good things I can say! This was perfect for us! Naomi was so helpful and extremely on top of things. The home is beautiful and feels homey and comfortable .
Naomi was so kid!
Great, quiet place. Update home with great space, comfortable living. Host is amazing, very responsive and went above and beyond. Made for a great stay in a small town.
beautiful, stylish, clean house with plenty of space four our family. all the amenities and comforts of home. quiet and pretty neighborhood close to the highway for convenience.
This was an absolutely great Airbnb! Super clean and comfortable! Exceeded expectations!
Fantastic updated house! Easily accessed, and spacious clean living space. Would absolutely stay here again!

This place looks incredible. There were conveniences I never would have noticed from the pictures - like a smart heated and lighted mirror, a bath bomb, make up remover towels to name a few. Everything in the house was tastefully updated! After a long day spent outdoors the tub was so nice! I appreciated that anything that was provided to use on skin was extra soft - like the towels, the blankets, bedding, pillows. And I always appreciate when the hosts think of providing Q-tips! The framed pictures of famous people from West Plains was such a fun idea and so memorable. I loved the laundry setup with the stone folding table. We’re doing a home renovation right now and I was taking notes! They did such a great job with the place. If we had our kids with us there would have still been plenty of room for all 5 of us and even one more. There’s a whole table designated for local recommendations, handbooks and WiFi and I even noticed a little office nook with a printer. The fireplace was such a bonus feature as well. Naomi was super responsive and friendly. Our experience was wonderful and the home is a total gem!
The house was so homey and clean! It was in a great neighborhood. Would definitely stay here again!

This air bnb was fantastic! Really comfortable beds, modern amenities, enormous shower decked out with cool blue light and a Bluetooth speaker, flat screen tvs, huge soaking tub- this place was better than a 5-star hotel! Very clean and well stocked with necessities. There were plenty of towels and everything else you could possibly need. Owner was very attentive and accommodating. Do not hesitate to book this house. We will definitely be back :)
Naomi’s place is in one of West Plains most beautiful neighborhoods. We so enjoyed all of the details taken care of. The design was very nice. Communication was wonderful as well. Enjoy!

We only stayed for a quick over night stay but it was a great stay and the beds were absolutely amazing. Lots of coffee pods to chose from with some snacks! This will become our first go to place to stay while visiting family!

Definitely recommend a stay here! Everything was clean and well managed! This place is actually nicer than the photos let on! You can tell the host put a lot of care into her thoughtful touches; like a varied assortment of coffee, a dark colored makeup removal rag, snacks, and comfortable bedding! I was a little nervous that the home would be hot since it didn't have central AC, but the window units did a great job and we were always comfortable! We definitely would stay again!

The house was very welcoming and clean. Heather was a wonderful host. We very much enjoyed our visit. The bed was very comfortable. We slept very good. We will definitely be staying here again on our next visit.
It was a great experience all and all. Thank you for the stay!
Stayed an extra day. Host was super accommodating. Thank you again. Would happily stay again.
Great host. Super friendly and accommodating. Cute home! Would stay again!
Awesome space! Clean and quiet. Worth every penny.
a lovely and neat and tidy house with everything you need for a pleasant stay.
Such a lovely home! Would definitely come back again. Such great hosts!
We enjoyed it there was a lot of different places to go and enjoy so thanks we will be renting again.
We had a wonderful time! We had everything we needed, and when I reached out to Heather with a question, she was very responsive! A fantastic getaway spot!
This was a beautiful home with all the comforts of home. Everything was very clean and we felt very safe. I will be renting this house again.

Thank you for a lovely stay! The queen bed was one of the most comfortable we’ve slept in, and linens were also comfortable with no strong scents - much appreciated. Thank you for the snack basket, a nice touch. There is a train that goes by occasionally, but not super close.
We would recommend this Airbnb to others.
Would recommend! Very quiet neighborhood. Close to restaurants and grocery store. Very clean and feels at home.
Perfect little home away from home.
Great stay
Great place to stay, and great location! They are super friendly and respond very quickly! 10/10 recommend!
We had a great stay at park place!
Great stay! Close to the hospital where I was working. It is conveniently located in town but a quiet neighborhood. I especially loved the touch of the fireplace going when I arrived. Very cozy bed.
Great host immediately fixed any problems we had.
This was the perfect size for me to stay while I came into town for training. Had everything I needed and was very comfortable!

It was very considerate to have the basic necessities for our stay. There was more provided than at previous Air BnB's. Variety of different coffees and even creamer in the fridge! - That made me SO happy to wake up to! Easy to find, Easy to communicate with and would stay there again.

We LOVED it! 1000% better than a hotel and cheaper! We felt at home and will definitely book it again as we are from West Plains but travel the US full time so it’s great to come home and see family and have a nice place to stay without imposing on family!
Great place! Definitely would stay again!
Very well-stocked and nicely appointed. Hot water gets super hot- - great for us but be mindful if you have children!
Perfect place fire what we were needing. Roomy, clean and a great location. We will be back.
This was such a cute place to stay! The attention to detail in making sure it was well-decorated, clean and homey made our stay fantastic. Thank you!
If you need a place to stay, park place is good in my book.
Heather was a great host, she was very responsive and help us with anything related to the house in a very proactive way. excellent stay, would definitively recommend
We really enjoyed our time here. The house was a perfect place to spend time in and the host was very quick to respond to any questions we had!

Very charming, comfortable, home away from home.
We enjoyed our stay!

We came into town for a funeral and to visit friends and family. This place was perfect for us, it was so cute and cozy and had a perfect Location in town. We went for daily walks in the park right across the street. The main bed was SO COMFORTABLE with big fluffy pillows and blankets! The house was stocked with everything you would need to live for a week or weekend. I thoroughly enjoyed the energy, the space and my time spent there.
Everything was well stocked and very clean.
This little home was very cozy and comfy!
It was just what we needed! Clean and welcoming! We will plan to stay again!
Very comfortable and clean.
It was just what we needed.
Heather was great to work with! Very responsive and very accommodating on a last minute notice!
Very clean. Great location. Thanks for letting me stay!
The place was very clean. super nice very nice little touchs too
We had a great stay at Heather’s house. Would definitely stay again.

This place was amazing! Super clean and well taken care of. Close to everything in town. Had every amenity we needed. The only downside we dealt with (and I hate to even add it because I know it's not the host's fault) is the neighbors dog outside barking all the time and pretty late into the night. It was right outside the bedroom windows so getting to sleep was a little rough.
great spot when you need to find a quick place in town
Thanks Heather. Your place was comfortable, convenient and centrally located. We enjoyed our stay.

Heather was so amazing! we came to visit for a night to see the grandbabies for the night, there was a small tree and it felt so homey! She's quick to respond and always seemed very sweet! Thanks for making our quick Christmas trip feel so special. Highly Recommend!
was a great place and Heather was super responsive!
1000% would recommend! Heather made booking easy and made my family and I feel at home with a personalized message on a board when we walked in. Can’t wait to book again!
Two nights while visiting family and this place was perfect for us and our dog. Cozy and quaint Felt safe and easy to get to. Walking path across the street was great for our dog.
Heather is always great to work with! we have used park place x2 in the last 30 days and it was like coming home. very comfortable!

Love our stay--the place was cozy, clean, and comfortable--the 3C's!!!
Heather was a peach to deal with--easy to communicate with and quick with responses. We had zero problems with the house. Enjoyed our time and will contact Heather in the future when in town for availability.

It was quick and easy to access. We only needed a spot to stop for the night while headed home to Kansas for thanksgiving. It was well equipped with some neat extras I haven’t seen in other Airbnb locations we’ve visited.
This was a great Airbnb experience! The duplex was very clean and just as expected. It was very homey and nicely decorated. Highly recommend to others.
This airbnb was clean, easy to access. Met the needs or our trip. Convenient, cozy
very clean and nicely decorated! bed was amazingly comfy! totally recommend for a stay!
Great place to stay.

The bed is super comfy, easy access to the walking trail from the back door, & it’s super close to the hospital if your on a healthcare contract! I gratefully appreciated the communication with the hosts!
Very nice, updated home. Perfect for our family of 5. Will stay again!
Cute and cozy. Very comfortable, and easy to get to.
Thank you again for everything! We had a long time stay and the fast communication was highly appreciated. Very good location, comfortable and plenty of space. Would recommend!

Good clean space, second time staying here in a short amount of time, although this time was an extended stay. Well worth your time and money, as Jeff and Heather are wonderful hosts and are very responsive!

This stay was extraordinary! Unfortunately we arrived late at around 9pm and left the next morning - so we did not get to experience it more. It was clean and smelled good, freshly updated, and the attention to detail was phenomenal! Truly, if you need a place to stay, pick this place. You won’t regret it.

I am always skeptical of being the first one as a guest but this experience has changed my mind! The hosts were very pro active, any questions we had we got a response right away. Even gave us some ideas on what to do in town. Would highly recommend and will be back again!

Everything is clean bed smell good and clean. I like the garage. The cleaning deposit was a little high, but I didn’t make a mess and they want you to pretty much do some cleaning before you leave but that’s fine. Was a nice day.
This was our second stay with Caitlin and everything was up to expectations. Highly recommend if you're staying in West Plains, close to everything!.

We have stayed with Caitlyn multiple times and this time was no different than the rest!! Her place is cozy, comfy and clean!! She is always responsive for any questions or concerns. Will definitely stay again.
Perfect. Clean, Comfortable. No complaints. I would stay here again. 💯
One on the best Airbnb's in West Plains! Cozy, comfortable, clean awesomd hostess!
Awesome place, willback soon! Best airbnb in West Plains!
Place was really clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay and would stay again.
Great place to stay. It was a clean house with everything we needed. Caitlin was very responsive.
I’ll be back really soon

Full disclosure, I made the reservation for my boyfriend, so this is second hand knowledge. He had no trouble finding it with clear entry information. It’s brand new, immaculate, and has everything he needed, including a washer and dryer, which was much appreciated. The bed was very comfortable. The most important thing was how responsive Caitlin was. I don’t think I ever waited more than 15 minutes for an answer. In addition, she was really flexible about check in and check out dates. My boyfriend told me the wrong date to start which was easily fixed. His purpose there was cut short, and he had to leave early. Caitlin was amazingly accommodating about that. I did let her know that on the front end that it might happen, but she went above and beyond. My boyfriend thought it was such a great place, that he told the educator with whom he worked to recommend this listing to future students. If my boyfriend goes back there, I will definitely try to book it again.

We traveled around during the day. It was very nice to have such a peaceful, clean, and well maintained home to come back to. Caitlin answered every question very quickly. The area is beautiful and the town is friendly and welcoming.

We really enjoyed our stay! We rented two of the townhomes side by side to accommodate our extended family, and it was the perfect place to stay in between our activities and visiting with friends. The rooms are all very large and the kitchen island perfect for the kids! Loved having a washer and dryer and full kitchen. All of the best were SO comfortable! We would happily recommend this stay to any friends or family coming to West Plains!
this was our 2nd time staying here and the house had everything we needed. and the host was very responsive to any needs and questions we had.
house had everything we needed. would stay again.
This is a beautiful space, well decorated and clean.. We enjoyed our stay very much!
Amazing host was perfect for our stay and will stay again in the future.
Super nice place! With the most comfy beds !!!

When I first opened the door the first thing I seen was a big hair ball underneath the TV stand also one up behind the full length mirror on the landing of stairs the lack of complementary water toilet paper paper towels or trash bags we had to go buy other places that I have stayed at had coffee bottled water plenty of trash bags we had one
Beautiful home! Definitely plan to stay there next time I’m in town.

The home was in great shape and spacious, with a very modern design. It accommodated our family's needs perfectly. The hosts were outstanding. They were easy to deal with and worked with us through some tough scheduling issues.
Great place and walkable to some good food.

Beautiful place, great location in West Plains--close to everything. The unit looked and smelled brand-new! So spacious and cozy! Lots of towels and wash clothes, so we didn't have to do laundry while we were there. So very pleased!! Our only complaint, and a minor one at that, we were surprised at that we could hear the trains coming through town--especially the train horns. We will absolutely stay with Chelsea again in the future.
Beautiful space and very clean!
The place was perfect for my husband and I. It was a good distance from restaurants and stores, there was a golf course close by for my husband, and it was very spacious and clean.

Beautiful condos look brand new. Our suite comfortably slept my family of 6 (3 adults & 3 kids) and with the large kitchen it was perfect for cooking and preparing for a family reunion. I would recommend this place to others. The host Chelsea was very friendly, professional and responsive.

Large and spacious townhome. Plenty of space for a family with a nice enclosed patio. Quiet safe street with parking right in front of the house. Big bedrooms with TV in each plus a TV in the main room. Great beds and linens. Exactly as shown in the description. Was an absolutely perfect place to stay in West Plains, minutes drive from stores and restaurants.

Almost new construction and well maintained. Very comfortable stay - enjoyed the week in West Plains!
Thank you for your hospitality!
Great place, clean and comfortable, the beds are really comfy! Host responded very quickly to address anything I needed! Highly recommend staying at her place.
Great little getaway!
Clean new place with lots of room and pristine kitchen. Close to the old town square. Old victorian neighborhood.
This was a spacious and very clean place. Totally recommend.
Would definitely stay again! So nice and clean! Bed was comfy.
Very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed staying there.
Great place to stay

Chelsea's home is exactly as listed. It is beautiful and spotless. The neighborhood is extremely quiet. We barely heard a sound from anyone. We were so comfortable there, my husband had a hard time getting me to leave. I would recommend anyone staying there and we will definitely do it again.

Chelsea was great. We were traveling to west plains to visit relatives and arrived early. Chelsea allowed us to check in around 11 instead of 3. The place was beautiful, well kept and clean. The beds were great!! Would recommend staying here.
Great place to stay! Clean and just what we needed. Chelsea was so helpful! Highly recommend ❤️
Enjoyed our stay at this location.
Nice place
Our stay at Chelsea’s home was very nice. It was comfortable, had a large nice clean bathrooms, the living area was large and it was decorated beautifully.
Was cleanest place I had ever rented. Great beds and linen. Basically a new home. Great host.
Love it
Comfortable and spacious home within walking distance of town. Clean, comfortable, and very quiet.
excellent place to stay.. excellent host and co host.. responsive to our needs and in a great time frame
Chelsea’s place was great and she was very accommodating…I needed to extend for a couple extra nights and she helped and made that very easy
A+

Chelsea was an amazing host. We had an unexpected issue upon arrival and Chelsea fixed it right away and we were so thankful! Chelsea's place is very spacious and gorgeous!! We will definitely be back!

We were in town for my mother’s remembrance ceremony. Laura’s home was in a perfect location. The home is beautiful and extremely well appointed. Being able to rest and enjoy the porch in the evenings made a difficult time more serene. I want to come back again!

A very cute house! Everything was very clean and all the extra linens was appreciated. The portable fans were a great idea too, as we get hot at night. We only stayed overnight so we didn't get to enjoy many of the cute sitting rooms or the porch. Thank you for your hospitality!
We loved this house! It was even better than described and was very clean! the linens smelled so fresh! We would like to go back and I would definitely recommend this house! Thank you Laura!

We stayed 4 nights at this amazing vintage home. We booked this home to view the eclipse and it was perfect. Beautifully decorated. Very comfortable beds. Everything was spotless! Great selection of dishes and baking pans. We enjoyed the screened in porch complete with outdoor lighting. We took advantage of the deck off the laundry room as well. Close to town. Laura gave us recommendations for places to eat and always responded to our messages. There was a lovely park in the area as well with trails. We highly recommend this wonderful property.

We thoroughly enjoyed this stay; the house is filled with character, balancing nostalgia with modern amenities. The all-season front porch is like stepping back in time, very cozy and comfortable setting throughout. Best stay (away from home) that we’ve had in years!!

Wow! Really enjoyed our weekend here. It's not often you get to see a home styled this beautifully. It snowed during our stay which definitely added to the experience. I've already recommended it to several friends and family and would definitely come and visit again.

This was a great stay and I'd absolutely stay again in a heartbeat! Everything was SO cute and had a ton of little details that I just loved! The host explained everything perfectly and even had some extras that I wasn't expecting at all and it was really close to everything so I didn't have to go far to get dinner or run for things I forgot. The beds were even super comfy and the rooms were set up really well so they had as much space as possible! 10 out of 10, for sure!

Absolutely loved the decor! Interesting mix of traditional and modern. Very cheery!
Spotlessly clean and very comfortable.
We’ll be back!
Peaceful, serene setting and cozy cabin. We loved it!
Super cute place within at least an hour’s drive to kayak 4-5 different rivers!! Will definitely look for this place again!
Great last minute getaway!
This is a great place to stay near the national forest. We will definitely be back.

This cabin is adorable and ever so cozy. It was the perfect antidote for a grieving heart.
I look forward to future stays.

Cathy’s place was a fantastic place to save us during our winter travels. It was so quiet and cozy. The stars were awesome and there’s even a friendly neighboring horse who will come say hello through the fence.
Great little cabin with lots of thoughtful, decorative touches. A little loud from road noise but otherwise loved the land and our friendly horse neighbor.
My partner and I were traveling through the area, and Cathy's place was the perfect spot for us to stay for a night. Everything was as described.
Beautiful and peaceful, love the horse! Thank you Cathy! Will stay here again.
awesome place. would definitely stay again
Very peaceful beautiful grey mare in the pastor next to you. She's so friendly and curious me and my wife petted her and she followed us around
Lovely time here ❤️
great place if you need quite and a great place to relax
I absolutely loved it! So cute and the horse was so sweet too!!
We have friends in West Plains and now have a place to stay when visiting! Very quaint, clean and fun place to stay.
I loved it

This was just what we were looking for - for an escape, easy-to-get-to, convenient “cabin” experience. We were greeted by a friendly horse and cows, there was a fire pit for a country campfire w/ a nice covered patio w/ lighting, and the “tiny” cabin was actually roomy and had everything we needed.
Awesome host!
Beautiful and comfortable space!
I had a great stay at Cathy's cabin! The cabin was very cute and well stocked. I was in the area for a work trip, but the cabin would be a great choice for a weekend getaway!
Second time staying. Great cabin!
Booked last minute while looking at property in the area. Cathy was very helpful and the cottage was perfect.
SO beautiful and so close to the National forest - our favorite place. The cabin was adorable, quiet and everything as promised. Our new favorite place. Thank you, Cathy!
Very nice place. Right on the highway so you have to get used to the occasional noise. Everything works as described.
Awesome stay!!
Great home away from home. Owned by very kind people. Beautiful cabin. I will be staying again.
This was a nice little cabin with good privacy will stay again.
Great Cabin, clean and tidy, comfortable bed, I’ll keep it in mind when traveling in the area again! Great patio / back yard area :)
Great little place out the way.

Cathy’s rustic cabin was a perfect place to get away from it all. Set off by itself which made it peaceful. Very close to multiple trails in the Mark Twain Forest. I will definitely keep this place in mind for a future trip!

We truly enjoyed this little piece of heaven and can’t wait for our next stay! It was spotless and had everything we needed. Noah communicated and responded quickly. Could not have asked for a better quick getaway!
great people! They will go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable
The attention of the 2 hosts was very good. They helped us with everything we needed.
Attentive hosts without ever being intrusive. New heat pump handled the cold nights and warm days without any fuss. Comfortable furnishings and elbow room. Everything seemed fresh and clean.

We were brand new to Airbnb. This was easy. I had been told there would be nothing so I feel like we brought the entire kitchen and didn't need to. Comfortable beds. The only thing I would add is directions on how to use the shower. My son slipped in the shower so new grippies for the bottom of the tub.

Nice and clean house with fair price. Thanks, Cleo!
very comfortable place to stay.
This cute little house is the niceat airbnb we've stayed at. Everything was exactly like it was pictured. We enjoyed staying here for a week.
Lovely place!! Thanks for having us

This house is great everything was as the add and pictures very clean spacious rooms full kitchen great for a long o short time we will keep this on our favorite places thank you Cleo Fawn for hosting us

This is probably the best Airbnb i have stayed at. It was clean, had the little extras that made it feel welcoming. There was water and soda in the fridge. Extra toiletries if needed. Everything was clean and neat. The host was easy to communicate with and very responsive. Would stay here again.

We rented here for a month while looking for land. The place was charming, tidy and very thoughtfully stocked with things from baking soda, flour and coffee in the kitchen to extra tooth brushes and laundry soap. The four bunks were perfect for the kids and the two tables meant there was a lot of room to spread out. The owners live nearby and were quick to respond to any questions we had. Convenient to stores/parks and on a pretty quiet street. We enjoyed our stay and would certainly recommend it to others
